## Requirements

Building the API client library requires:
1. Java 1.8+
2. Maven (3.8.3+)/Gradle (7.2+)

## Installation

To install the API client library to your local Maven repository, simply execute:

```shell
mvn clean install
```

To deploy it to a remote Maven repository instead, configure the settings of the repository and execute:

```shell
mvn clean deploy
```

Refer to the [OSSRH Guide](http://central.sonatype.org/pages/ossrh-guide.html) for more information.

### Maven users

Add this dependency to your project's POM:

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>sdk.kubevela</groupId>
  <artifactId>build_push_image</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.1</version>
  <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
```

### Gradle users

Add this dependency to your project's build file:

```groovy
  repositories {
    mavenCentral()     // Needed if the 'build_push_image' jar has been published to maven central.
    mavenLocal()       // Needed if the 'build_push_image' jar has been published to the local maven repo.
  }

  dependencies {
     implementation "sdk.kubevela:build_push_image:0.0.1"
  }
```

### Others

At first generate the JAR by executing:

```shell
mvn clean package
```

Then manually install the following JARs:

* `target/build_push_image-0.0.1.jar`
* `target/lib/*.jar`
